mapper.insert: insert into report(report_title, report_content, report_writer, report_category, report_secret, temporary) values (#{reportTitle}, #{reportContent}, #{reportWriter}, #{reportCategory}, #{reportSecret}, #{temporary})
mapper.update: update report set reportTitle= #{reportTitle} where report_id = #{reportId}
update report set report_view= report_view + 1 where report_id =#{reportId}
mapper.select: select * from ( select ROW_NUMBER() over(order by report_id desc)as report_no, r.* from report r where r.report_category=#{category1}) r2 where r2.report_no between #{start} and #{end}
select count(*) from report where report_category=#{category1}
select count(*) from report where report_title like concat('%', #{search1}, '%')
